file.name: scheduled-report.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Adzerk Management API - Scheduled Reporting
  description: Scheduled Reporting related Adzerk Management API
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'https://api.adzerk.net'
tags:
  - name: scheduled-report
    description: Scheduled Reporting
paths:
  /v1/report/schedule:
    get:
      tags:
        - scheduled-report
      operationId: list
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: The size of the page to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
            default: 500
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: The page number to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: A paged list of Scheduled Reports
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/scheduled-report.yaml#/schemas/ScheduledReportList'
    post:
      tags:
        - scheduled-report
      operationId: create
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Name
                - LoginID
                - KickoffDate
                - SchedulingWindow
                - RecurrenceType
                - Criteria
              properties:
                Name:
                  type: string
                LoginID:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                KickoffDate:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                SchedulingWindow:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  enum: [0, 1, 2, 3]
                RecurrenceType:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  enum: [0, 1, 2, 3]
                Criteria:
                  type: object
                  required:
                    - StartDateISO
                    - EndDateISO
                    - GroupBy
                    - Parameters
                  properties:
                    StartDateISO:
                      type: string
                      format: date-time
                    EndDateISO:
                      type: string
                      format: date-timme
                    GroupBy:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: string
                        enum:
                          - day
                          - week
                          - month
                          - hour
                          - brandId
                          - campaignId
                          - optionId
                          - creativeId
                          - adTypeId
                          - siteId
                          - zoneId
                          - publisherAccountId
                          - countryCode
                          - metroCode
                          - keyword
                          - regionCode
                          - city
                    Parameters:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                    TimeZone:
                      type: string
                Emails:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: string
                    format: email
                ShowEvents:
                  type: boolean
                  nullable: true
                ShowClickBucketing:
                  type: boolean
                  nullable: true
                ShowRevenue:
                  type: boolean
                  nullable: true
                ShowConversions:
                  type: boolean
                  nullable: true
                fixedDate:
                  type: boolean
                  nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: The scheduled report
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/scheduled-report.yaml#/schemas/ScheduledReport'
  '/v1/report/schedule/{id}':
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Report Id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    get:
      tags:
        - scheduled-report
      operationId: get
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: The Report
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/scheduled-report.yaml#/schemas/ScheduledReport'
  '/v1/report/schedule/{id}/delete':
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Report Id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    get:
      tags:
        - scheduled-report
      operationId: delete
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: The Report
components:
  securitySchemes:
    $ref: './components/security-schemes.yaml#/components/securitySchemes'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 190: cannot unmarshal !!str `./compo...` into ogen.SecurityScheme
